name: Metabolize Element
summary: Your rapidly metabolize the elemental particles in your opponent's spell to gain a boost of energy.
description:
Your rapidly metabolize the elemental particles in your opponent's spell to gain a boost of energy. You gain the quickened condition until the end of your next turn. You can use the extra action only to Step or Stride.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
trigger: You take damage from a foe's spell or magical ability with the air, earth, fire, or water trait.
